Room.Name: Ivanhouse Sporting Arena - Mul Pit
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Mul Pit. Muls are cross-breeds of dwarves and humans.
Room.LongDescription: Taking the height of the human and strength of the dwarven parents, the mul has come to be one of the most feared gladiators. Being outcasts from almost all society, they tend to find themselves in arenas anyway, fighting for their right to survive and gain glory. The Mul Pit may be a dangerous arena because only one fighter may be in here at once, but the muls have no such restrictions.
